meanings.definition: Having a single valve or shell.
meanings.sent1: The univalved clam was easy to spot on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the univalved shell carefully.
meanings.sent3: The univalved oyster told the best jokes at the underwater party.
meanings.sent4: Her univalved heart beat with a steady rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The univalved seashell shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Consisting of one piece or part.
meanings.sent1: The univalved puzzle was challenging to solve.
meanings.sent2: The univalved chair was surprisingly comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The univalved cake was a hit at the birthday party.
meanings.sent5: The univalved necklace sparkled under the lights.
